0001011101011000 1010110101110100 1 -> sum: 1100010011001101, cout: 0
0100110101111000 0001000001000001 0 -> sum: 0101110110111001, cout: 0
0100110101001110 1100001100100010 0 -> sum: 0001000001110000, cout: 1
0111110000011010 1010101010100100 0 -> sum: 0010011010111110, cout: 1
0110110100111111 0111001111111000 0 -> sum: 1110000100110111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
